EmailTemplate.name: Case Close Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} Has Been Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for contacting {!Organization.Name}. Since you've indicated that your issue is resolved, we have now closed your case. We hope your experience with us was positive. If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
If you have a moment, please help us improve our customer service by filling out our <make this a hyperlink to your survey>Customer Satisfaction Survey.
Thanks again!
The {!Organization.Name} Customer Engagement Team
